name: LuduFi
intro: NFT lending and digital asset management tools
introduce: LuduFi is building a single dashboard for Guilds, Gamers and Investors to easily manage their NFT assets for 100’s of games. The LuduFi Asset Management Tool enables users to efficiently manage and measure their ROI and asset performance using a real-time NFT price feed. LuduFi's lending protocol allows asset holders from supported games to lease out idle NFTs to players for a share of their earnings. Players use lending marketplace and filter for an NFT with their desired lease period and earning split to commence their Play + Earn journey.
